item.title: Tragic Collision in Raichur Claims Lives
item.description:
<![CDATA[A head-on collision between a truck and two pickup vehicles near Boodiwal Cross in Sindhanur taluk, Raichur district, resulted in the death of four individuals on Tuesday, according to local police. The victims, who were traveling in the pickup vehicles, died instantly at the scene.
The police reported that the pickup vehicles were consecutively on their way to Ballari, carrying sheep, when they were struck by a truck approaching from the opposite side. The impact was devastating, leaving the v...]]>
item.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
